Class AddAppliancetoBasketHandler

java.lang.Object
customerHandlers.AddAppliancetoBasketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
public class AddAppliancetoBasketHandler extends Object implements HttpHandler
Handles adding an appliance to the shopping basket.
Author:
24862664
